author: Leonard Matarese
text:
We are interested in hearing from managers who do not have supervisory responsibility of their police chiefs. Specifically we are trying to learn how common this is and what problems it creates. Further, who does the chief actually report to on a day to day basis? Any information you can offer will be helpful to our research.
If you want to avoid a public posting of the issues you encounter, please email me directly or call me. Thanks
Leonard A. Matarese
Director of Research & Project Development
ICMA Center of Public Safety Management
Lmatarese@ICMA.org
716-969-1360
title: Seeking managers who do not have supervisory authority over the police chief.
